condition.ab: Dark brown triangular fragment; broken off diagonally at left and right to form triangle with a vertex facing down and its base facing up. There are three minor wormholes; it has the upper margin. Some of the survived text is partly washed out and it���s clear and legible on verso; there is a diagonal dark line of mud at the left side on verso. Fragments A and B have almost a similar shape except for A has its vertex down and in B is up; probably the whole document was broken off when it was folded. There is a small piece of scotch tape at the top to the left.

layout.ab: fr. 1: 8 lines; fr. 2: 7 lines; fr. 3: 3 lines

handDesc.p: Written along the fibers; the hand is practiced and neat; used blank ink with a fine nib. The hand is characterized by two separated curved strokes as epsilon; rho, with a long vertical strokes ended with a hook; iota is prolonged equally to upper and lower interlinear spaces; alpha has two loops at the same side; beta has one small loop at the top and a big one at bottom; U-shaped nu with a vertical stroke at the left; sigma formed as a curved stroke facing up with prolonging the left edge horizontally to right. The interlinear spaces are relatively wide of 0.9 cm. No paragraphos, accentuation or other diacritical marks. ;fr. 2: Written along the fibers; the hand is practiced and neat; used blank ink with a fine nib. The hand is characterized by two separated curved strokes as epsilon; rho, with a long vertical strokes ended with a hook; iota is prolonged equally to upper and lower interlinear spaces; alpha has two loops at the same side; beta has one small loop at the top and a big one at bottom; U-shaped nu with a vertical stroke at the left; sigma formed as a curved stroke facing up with prolonging the left edge horizontally to right. The interlinear spaces are relatively wide of 0.9 cm. No paragraphos, accentuation or other diacritical marks. Verso is written across the fibers in the same hand; only interlinear spaces are wider. The same hand wrote fragment A, B and C. Lower part has the margin of ca. 3.2 cm.;Verso is written across the fibers in the same hand; only interlinear spaces are wider.

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
